item.description:
The first game night of the new year takes place this coming Wednesday, starting at 8 pm and running until 11-12 or thereabouts. Feel free to suggest games you want to play, or wait until you arrive to have me throw a few games at you.

Also, for those who want to immerse themselves in a full day of gaming, think about considering Unity Games XVII in Woburn, MA on Jan. 29, 2011. The game day starts at 9 am and ends at midnight, with 400-ish people in attendance, many of whom have brought games to share with everyone. The cost is $12 if you prepay (and I can collect for those in NH who plan to attend) or $20 at the door. If you want to prepay, the deadline is Jan. 15. For more details on the event, head to http://www.unitygames...

Eric
item.name: Gaming in Concord, NH
